VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: - Vivъncia de 30 anos em TI nas сreas Industrial, Financeira, Varejista e Acadъmica. - Devido р atuaчуo em empresas de grande porte, adquiri know how em processos e documentaчуo no desenvolvimento e integraчуo de sistemas. - Atuei no Desenvolvimento de Projetos Lѓgicos e Fэsicos, Levantamentos junto ao usuсrio, Especificaчѕes Tщcnico/Funcional, com utilizaчуo de Metodologia de Anсlise Estruturada, Modelagem de Dados, MER-DER, DFD e Project. - Atuei em Anсlise, Desenvolvimento, Programaчуo e Manutenчуo nos Sistemas de Cartѕes (Visanet), Concessуo de Crщdito, Crщdito Direto ao Consumidor, Crщdito Rural, Custѓdia de Cheques, Emprщstimo Comercial e Rural, Fianчa Bancсria, Finame, Gestуo de Cobranчa, Leasing, Mutuсrios, Prevenчуo a Lavagem de Dinheiro, Resoluчуo 63, Resoluчуo 2148, Risco Financeiro e SPB (MQ-Series). - Atuei na coordenaчуo e treinamento de equipes de analistas e programadores em Plataforma Main-Frame. - Atuo como Professor Universitсrio em disciplinas de Lѓgica de Programaчуo, Linguagem de Programaчуo C++ e Metodologia e Desenvolvimento de Projetos. - Conhecimento em Alta e Baixa Plataformas - Linguagens : Cobol, CICS, EasyTrieve, Natural, C++, C# - Sistemas Operacionais :, OS/390, UNIX, MS Windows - DBs : DB2, SQL, ADABAS, VSAM, SQL Server, Access, DMS/II, LINC/II - Ferramentas : Endevor, TSO, ROSCOE, File Aid, QMF, JCL, UML, EA, BPWIN, ERWIN, VI, CANDE, WFL

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: Luiz Eduardo Nunes Nicollini do Patrocэnio

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Serviчos de arquitetura e engenharia; testes e anсlises tщcnicas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The determination of the effort required to develop a project is the key factor in its approval and success. The effort includes not only the time and cost required for the development or maintenance of software projects, but also the number of people and hours required that each one must devote to the project. Efficient estimates allows the verification of the viability of the project, preparation of technical and commercial proposals, the production of detailed plans and schedules, and effective monitoring of the project. The risk measures have important roles in the development process of a project. Therefore, the estimates are the main activities of planning for the development of a software project. The Function Point Analysis (FPA) is a metric that allows a planning more realistic of the resource required. Based on a preliminary survey of the scope and structure of the application, FPA allows a reliable estimate, giving a preview of deadlines, costs and people needed for the development of the project. With the application of APF in automation process that involve supervisory systems, it will be possible for engineers to diagnose the necessary time and costs in the implementation of automated processes allowing for better planning. This study aims at applying the technique of algorithmic model of Function Point Analysis (FPA) to determine the effort required in developping supervisory systems using the LabVIEW application, where several parameters are applied to quantify the estimation of effort at various levels application mainly detecting the most complex elements that influence the project. As results we expected to get a major factor in measuring risk and still provide meaningful information to support decision that makes work more clear in terms of time, effort and cost, respecting their priorities.
